Uses of Class
org.springdata.cassandra.cql.spec.ColumnSpecification

  • Packages that use ColumnSpecification 
    Package Description
    org.springdata.cassandra.cql.spec  

    • Uses of ColumnSpecification in org.springdata.cassandra.cql.spec

      Methods in org.springdata.cassandra.cql.spec that return ColumnSpecification 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ColumnSpecification ColumnSpecification.clusteringKeyPart()
      Identifies this column as a primary key column with default ordering.
      ColumnSpecification ColumnSpecification.clusteringKeyPart(Ordering order)
      Identifies this column as a primary key column with the given ordering.
      ColumnSpecification ColumnSpecification.clusteringKeyPart(Ordering ordering, boolean enable)
      Toggles the identification of this column as a primary key column.
      ColumnSpecification ColumnSpecification.name(String name)
      Sets the column's name.
      ColumnSpecification ColumnSpecification.partitionKeyPart()
      Identifies this column as a primary key column that is also part of a partition key.
      ColumnSpecification ColumnSpecification.partitionKeyPart(boolean enable)
      Toggles the identification of this column as a primary key column that also is or is part of a partition key.
      ColumnSpecification ColumnSpecification.primaryKeyPart(KeyPart keyPart, Ordering ordering)
      Identifies this column as a primary key column.
      ColumnSpecification ColumnSpecification.primaryKeyPart(KeyPart keyPart, Ordering ordering, boolean enable)
      Identifies this column as a primary key column.
      ColumnSpecification ColumnSpecification.type(com.datastax.driver.core.DataType type)
      Sets the column's type.
      Methods in org.springdata.cassandra.cql.spec that return types with arguments of type ColumnSpecification 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<ColumnSpecification> TableSpecification.getAllColumns()
      Returns an unmodifiable list of all columns.
      List<ColumnSpecification> TableDescriptor.getAllColumns()
      Returns an unmodifiable List of ColumnSpecifications.
      List<ColumnSpecification> TableSpecification.getClusteringKeyColumns()
      Returns an unmodifiable list of all primary key columns that are not also partition key columns.
      List<ColumnSpecification> TableDescriptor.getClusteringKeyColumns()
      Returns an unmodifiable list of all primary key columns that are not also partition key columns.
      List<ColumnSpecification> TableSpecification.getNonKeyColumns()
      Returns an unmodifiable list of all non-key columns.
      List<ColumnSpecification> TableDescriptor.getNonKeyColumns()
      Returns an unmodifiable list of all non-key columns.
      List<ColumnSpecification> TableSpecification.getPartitionKeyColumns()
      Returns an unmodifiable list of all partition key columns.
      List<ColumnSpecification> TableDescriptor.getPartitionKeyColumns()
      Returns an unmodifiable list of all partition key columns.
      List<ColumnSpecification> TableSpecification.getPrimaryKeyColumns()
      Returns an unmodifiable list of all primary key columns that are not also partition key columns.
      List<ColumnSpecification> TableDescriptor.getPrimaryKeyColumns()
      Returns an unmodifiable list of all partition and primary key columns.
